message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.NE. 

The paper presents an approach for recursively splitting and rephrasing complex English sentences into a semantic hierarchy, which can facilitate a wide variety of artificial intelligence tasks such as machine translation and information extraction. This suggests that the paper could belong to several arXiv CS sub-categories, including cs.CL (Computation and Language), cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.IR (Information Retrieval), and cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing). Among these, cs.CL is the most likely category as it specifically deals with natural language processing and computational linguistics, which are the main focus of the paper.
